node.description: Names, descriptions, and documentation for all node types, as well as descriptions of start and end of expression evaluations for debugging.

AnyType.description: Any type. Not actually written in code, but can be generated internally.

BinaryEvaluate.description: An infix formatted binary operation, e.g., `1 + 1` or `2 ÷ 3` Description inputs: $1 = the operator Start inputs: $1 = left expression Finish inputs: $1 = resulting value

conflict.description: Conflicts that this node can generate

OrderOfOperations.description: Warning about order of evaluation of binary evaluations always being reading order, not math order of operations

description.description: A precise description of the node's contents, more specific than a name. If not provided, name is used.

doc.description: Documentation text that appears in the documentation view

emotion.description: The emotion that should be conveyed in animations of the node type

finish.description: The text shown when this expression type finishes evaluating and has a value.

name.description: The name that should be used to refer to the node type

right.description: How to describe the right operand in a placeholder expression

start.description: The text shown when this expression type first begins evaluating.

Bind.description: Naming a value, e.g., `mybinding: 5m` Description inputs: $1 = the name that is bound Start inputs: $1 = the bind name being evaluated Finish inputs: $1 = the value producd, $2: the names bound

conflict.description: Conflicts that this node can generate

DuplicateName.description: When a bind has duplicate names. Description inputs: $1: The name that shadowed this one

DuplicateShare.description: When a shared bind has a duplicate name that's shared. Description inputs: $1: The duplicate

IncompatibleType.description: When a bind and it's value type are incompatible. Description inputs: $1: Expected type, $2: Given type

MisplacedShare.description: When a bind is marked as share, but not at the top level.

MissingShareLanguages.description: When a bind is shared, but not language tagged.

RequiredAfterOptional.description: When a bind is required, but appears after an optional bind in a definition

UnexpectedEtc.description: When a bind is marked as a variable length list, but not at the end.

UnusedBind.description: When a bind is declared but never used.

Evaluate.description: An evaluation of a function with inputs, e.g., `myfun(1 2 3)` Description inputs: $1 = name of function being evaluated Start inputs: none Finish inputs: $1 = resulting value

conflict.description: Conflicts that this node can generate

IncompatibleInput.description: When an input given to this evaluate doesn't match the input of the function being evaluated Description inputs: $1 = expected type, $2 = given type

InputListMustBeLast.description: When a list of inputs is given but isn't last.

MisplacedInput.description: When an input is given, but in the wrong order.

MissingInput.description: When an input is expected, but not given. Description inputs: $1 = missing input, $2: evaluate that is missing input

NotInstantiable.description: When the structure definition given is an interface, and can't be created

UnexpectedInput.description: When an input value is given but not expected Description inputs: $1 = evaluate with unexected input, $2: unexpected input

UnexpectedTypeInput.description: When a type input given is not expected. Description inputs: $1 = definition given, $2: type given

UnknownInput.description: When an named input value is given but not a known input name
